mapper.insert: insert into honey_membs(EMAIL, MB_NICK, MB_NM, TEL, PWD) values(#{email}, #{nickname}, #{userName}, 1111, password(#{password}))
insert into HONEY_MESGS(mb_no, mb_no2,MESGS_CONTS, insertDate) values(#{loginUserNo}, #{messageTargetUserNo},#{message}, now())
mapper.select: select MB_NO, PWD, EMAIL, MB_NICK, TEL, MB_NM from honey_membs where EMAIL=#{email} and PWD=password(#{password})
select EMAIL, MB_NICK, MB_NM, TEL, PWD, INTRODUCE from honey_membs where MB_NO=#{value}
select EMAIL, MB_NICK, MB_NM, TEL, PWD from honey_membs where MB_NO=#{userNo}
select * from honey_flw where MB_NO=#{memberNo} and MB_NO2=#{followMemberNo}

select honey_mesgs.mb_no, honey_membs.mb_nick,mbp_path
from honey_mesgs
inner join honey_membs on honey_mesgs.mb_no = honey_membs.mb_no inner join honey_membs_photos on honey_membs.mb_no = honey_membs_photos.mb_no
where honey_mesgs.no in ( select max(honey_mesgs.no) from honey_mesgs inner join honey_membs on honey_mesgs.mb_no = honey_membs.mb_no where honey_mesgs.mb_no2 = #{loginUserNo} group by honey_mesgs.mb_no )
and mbp_no in ( select max(mbp_no) from honey_membs_photos inner join honey_membs on honey_membs_photos.mb_no = honey_membs.mb_no where honey_mesgs.mb_no2= #{loginUserNo} group by honey_membs_photos.mb_no )
order by honey_mesgs.insertDate desc;

select no, mesgs_conts, status, insertDate from honey_mesgs where mb_no=#{loginUserNo} and mb_no2=#{messageTargetUserNo} or mb_no=#{messageTargetUserNo} and mb_no2=#{loginUserNo} order by insertDate desc

select hb.BD_NO,hb.BD_TITL,hb.BD_CRE,hb.BD_LIKE,hb.VIEW_CT,hb.MB_NO,hb.CT_NO, hb.BD_LIKE, hm.MB_NO, hm.MB_NICK, hc.CT_NO, hc.CT_NM,hb.BD_CONTS, FILE_STATUS, YOUTUBE_URL from honey_boards hb left join honey_membs hm on hm.MB_NO = hb.MB_NO left join honey_ctg hc on hb.CT_NO = hc.CT_NO where hb.mb_no=#{memberNo} order by BD_NO desc
mapper.delete: delete from honey_flw where MB_NO=#{memberNo} and MB_NO2=#{followMemberNo}
mapper.update: update honey_membs set EMAIL=#{email}, MB_NICK=#{nickname}, MB_NM=#{userName}, TEL=#{phone}, INTRODUCE=#{introduce} where MB_NO=#{memberNo}
update honey_membs set PWD=password(#{password}) where MB_NO=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: select EMAIL from honey_membs where email= #{email}
select status from honey_mesgs where status=0 and MB_NO2=#{memberNo}
